content:
1. Mashihaayo-devam sabha cholli
Veshyaasthree nyaan durvrttha,
Nin priyayaay-theerkkanamenne nee
Parishuddhaa, parishuddhasuthaa!
/tenne nirmmalayaakkaname
/tthaanuttharamavallodarulli
/tmaamodeesaavellllatthil
Mungippaavanayaayu neeyen
Manavaattisthhaanam kollka.

2. Punyamezhum-rakthashareerangall
Nirmmalamaakum mooronum
Shuddhathaye-sabhayil cherttheedum
Moonnu mahaamarmmangall thaan
/tsaatthaanavallude divyathaye
/tkandaare virayal poondu
/tkartthaavavalle kaakkumpoll
Poril nyaan lajikkunnen
Ennevam cholli kenaan.
